definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

pinyin: cun2 kuan3 zhun3 bei4 jin1 lu:4

sentences.english: In the mean while, it shall write off the amount of the relevant receivable reinsurance reserve.
sentences.chinese: 同时，转销相关应收分保准备金余额。

sentences.english: They raised reserve requirements so banks wouldhave less capital to lend.
sentences.chinese: 他们提高了银行准备金率以令其用于贷款的资产缩水。

sentences.english: Robust Bayesian Estimate of Outstanding Claims Reserve In Non-Life Insurance;
sentences.chinese: 未决赔款准备金的估计对于保险公司而言非常重要。

sentences.english: Issues on withdrawal of reserve by futures exchanges and futures brokerage companies.
sentences.chinese: 期货交易所和期货经纪机构提取准备金的问题。

sentences.english: A tax return-to-tax provision comparison should be done with all differences adequately explained.
sentences.chinese: 比较税返还和税准备金应有各个方面的适当解释。

sentences.english: And the recent lowering of bank reserve requirements is a godsend.
sentences.chinese: 最近银行存款准备金的下调也是一个好消息。

sentences.english: Bank of America set aside another $2.1bn to cover credit losses.
sentences.chinese: 美国银行再预留21亿美元信贷损失准备金。

sentences.english: Bank reserve ratios are more market-oriented than direct lending controls, " said Gao Shanwen, chief economist at China Essence Securities in Beijing."
sentences.chinese: 准备金率比直接控制贷款更具有市场导向性。

sentences.english: The information about the increase and decrease of the reinsurance reserves for the ceded-in business.
sentences.chinese: 分入业务各项分保准备金的增减变动情况。

sentences.english: The term capital used in the two foregoing paragraphs refers to owners' equity and various kinds of reserves.
sentences.chinese: 前二项所称资金，包括业主权益及各种责任准备金。

sentences.english: Secondly, improve the loan loss ratio of pre-tax deduction.
sentences.chinese: 提高贷款损失准备金的税前扣除比例。

sentences.english: Now the reserve requirement is progressive.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个法定准备金率是逐步上升的。

definition: Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)
to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
